alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 1:43PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...The Central Black Hills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
